description:
Mahad, along with http://anidb.net/ch84320 [Vittel] and http://anidb.net/ch71398 [Ja`far], was formerly an assassin of http://anidb.net/ch84317 [Sham Lash]. After http://anidb.net/ch63160 [Sinbad] conquered the 6th Dungeon, http://anidb.net/ch84270 [Valefor], he became a merchant of Sindria Company and joined Sinbad in his travels. He`s a quiet person and good at observing people as well as taking care of his employees.
Mahad grew up with Vittel and they stuck together as they both shared the common fate as war orphans. They both started to steal for survival and eventually both were picked up by Sham Lash.
Source: Magi Wiki, edited.
name: Mahad
